name: Homebody (itch)
description:
Controls :

- spacebar to attack

- a and d to move

Upgrades (mouseclicks) :

- w dash

- s knockback

Hey !

This is my first game, made for #MyFirstGameJam (theme cold), hope you like it.

I have ideas to update the game in mind, but as the game jam is coming to an end I'll already upload it and probably move on to my next game as I've learned quite a lot from this one.

Enjoy.

Credits :

Sound effects - zapslpat

Music - "The new darker you", The Tower of Light (youtube audio library)

Made with Unity
